title: Aneurysms On The Rise Following Global Covid-19(84) Vaccine Rollout!!
cleaned_text:
The COVID-19 vaccine spike protein, when expressed in blood vessel walls, causes inflammation which damages the wall, leading to the formation of an aneurysm.

Dozens of cases in just a few weeks are popping up of young healthy people “dying suddenly” from a brain aneurysm.

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers the latest Covid-19(84) news showing why the vaccines should never have been trusted by anyone to be safe.

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
